EveryLife Face & Body Lotion, Lavender

Brand: EveryLife

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic Capric/Triglycerides, C13-15 Alkane, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Propanediol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sodium Benzoate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Cellulose Gum, Xanthan Gum, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Calophyllum Inophyllum Seed Oil*, Glycerin, Avena

Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sodium Benzoate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Cellulose Gum, Xanthan Gum, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Calophyllum Inophyllum Seed Oil*, Glycerin, Avena Sativa (Oat) Meal Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Flower Extract
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
